article.title: Mission 1st Support Theater Signal Command
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Mission 1st Inc., Shrewsbury, N.J., was awarded a $12,350,815 modification to a previously awarded firm-fixed-price contract for services in support of the Theatre Signal Command. The cumulative total face value of this contract is $111,350,815. The Army Contracting Command, Rock Island, Ill., is the contracting activity.
